input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: Looking for a way to give your cat a comfortable and stylish place to call their own? Look no further than the Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black! This beautiful cat tree is made from high-quality wood and covered in black carpet, making it the perfect place for your cat to relax and play. With dimensions of 47" H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W, this cat tree is the perfect size for most cats. And with easy-to-follow instructions and all the necessary tools included, assembly is a breeze! So why wait? Give your cat the perfect place to call home with the Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black.
input_text.Response B: Introducing the MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic Front Zip! This long sleeve mock neck synthetic french terry full zip features self-fabric applique, woven label, and cotton 94%/organic cotton 6%. Made in Egypt.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
